refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: CONF_modules_free() closes down and frees up all memory allocated by all configuration modules.
CONF_modules_finish() calls each configuration modules finish handler to free up any configuration that module may have performed.

CONF_modules_unload() finishes and unloads configuration modules. If all is set to 0 only modules loaded from DSOs will be unloads. If all is 1 all modules, including builtin modules will be unloaded.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: Normally applications will only call CONF_modules_free() at application to tidy up any configuration performed.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUE
refsection.para: None of the functions return a value.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: CONF_modules_free(), CONF_modules_unload(), and CONF_modules_finish() first appeared in OpenSSL 0.9.7.
